page.title: 03RELIGION HINTON-ON-THE-GREEN
page.content: {BELIEFS}- Most of the residents hold Christian beliefs mainly Church of England. One family is Roman Catholic. {SERVICES}- Services are held alternatly 10:30am and 6:00pm with Sedgeberrow. There are no other events on a Sunday or during the week.The average attendance at the morning service is 19 people. The average attendance is 20 people. The average age of people attending church is 50+.The last wedding was in May 1983. {BELL-RINGING}-There is a peal of eight bells. The bellringers come from within the village. Other teams visit. {FINANCES}- They only have collections on festival days. They have collection boxes which are opened every three months.
